GameModel.mobs

Class Mob

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameModel.Character
      • GameModel.mobs.Mob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BabySpider, Dragon, GiantRat, GiantSpider, Goblin, GoblinShaman, Grue, Imp, SkeletonArcher, SkeletonWarrior, Troll

    public abstract class Mob
extends Character
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Mob is Character and implement runnable. Mob is father abstract class for all the mobs in the game. contain the world of which the mobs are in. and store default experience points for the mobs.
    Author:
    Mazen Shihab
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
